message.content:
{"id": "7734", 
"title": "System shuts down without save file warnings", 
"description": "When a WSWB session is open with some opened, dirty .txt file, shutting down Windows will cause the loss of the changes in the .txt file.", 
"OB": "Open WSWB and create a new project. Create a text file in the project and add a line of text to it. Notice that the text file is marked as a dirty file. Left click on the Windows Start menu, select 'Shut Down...' command to shutdown/reboot the computer.", 
"EB": "A warning or question message box should be displayed to give users a chance to save their dirty model(s) before shutting down the computer.", 
"SR": "When shutting down the computer, display a warning or question message box that allows users to save their dirty model(s) before proceeding with the shutdown."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7734', 'title': 'Bug 7734System can be shut down without savefile warnings', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'When a WSWB session is open with some opened, dirty .txt file, shutting downWindows will cause the loss of the changes in the .txt file.Steps To Reproduce:start WSWB and create a new projectcreate a text file in the project and add a line of text to it.Notice thatthetext file is marked as a dirty fileLeft click on the Windows Start menu, select “Shut Down…” command to shutdown/reboot the computerResults:There is no warning or question message box to give users a chance to savetheir dirty model(s), the computer is shut down/rebooted immediately.OtherWindows programs (like Word, Outlook etc. '}
